channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect

item.title: CVE-2018-1788|2024-08-05T04:07:44.300Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Server 7.1 and 8.1 could disclose highly sensitive information via trace logs to a local privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 148873.

item.title: CVE-2018-1786|2024-08-05T04:07:44.390Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 dsmc and dsmcad processes incorrectly accumulate TCP/IP sockets in a CLOSE_WAIT state. This can cause TCP/IP resource leakage and may result in a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 148871.

item.title: CVE-2018-1550|2024-08-05T04:07:43.410Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 could allow a local user to corrupt or delete highly sensitive information that would cause a denial of service to other users. IBM X-Force ID: 142696.

item.title: CVE-2018-1785|2024-08-05T04:07:44.387Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1) uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 148870.

item.title: CVE-2018-1545|2024-08-05T04:07:43.312Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1) uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 142649.

item.title: CVE-2018-1853|2024-08-05T04:14:38.703Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager (IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1) could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 151014.

item.title: CVE-2017-1339|2024-08-05T13:32:29.247Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 (formerly Tivoli Storage Manager) Server uses weak encryption for the password. A database administrator may be able to decrypt the IBM Spectrum protect client or administrator password which can result in information disclosure or a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 126247.

item.title: CVE-2018-1787|2024-08-05T04:07:44.362Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 is affected by a password exposure vulnerability caused by insecure file permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 148872.

item.title: CVE-2018-1447|2024-08-05T03:59:39.101Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: The GSKit (IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 7.2) and (IBM Spectrum Protect Snapshot 4.1.3, 4.1.4, and 4.1.6) CMS KDB logic fails to salt the hash function resulting in weaker than expected protection of passwords. A weak password may be recovered. Note: After update the customer should change password to ensure the new password is stored more securely. Products should encourage customers to take this step as a high priority action. IBM X-Force ID: 139972.

item.title: CVE-2017-1301|2024-08-05T13:32:29.321Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack. IBM Spectrum Protect Backup-archive Client creates temporary files insecurely. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability by creating a symbolic link from a temporary file to various files on the system, which could allow the attacker to overwrite arbitrary files on the system with elevated privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 125163.
